column1: Executive MSc Health Economics, Policy and Management
column2: London School of Economics and Political Science
column5: Ask LSEThe Executive MSc Health Economics, Policy and Management offers a comprehensive interdisciplinary toolkit to elevate your career in the health sector. The two-year taught modular degree integrates rigorous health economics training with insights into the policy process, the design and analysis of health services research, and discusses current health management problems.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Taught in 24 months in module blocks
